title: Adventure Woman Alexis: Female Biker Character
description: Adventure Woman Alexis is a beautiful, PBR, female character model suited to any adventure.
longDescription:
Preview: youtube.com/watch?v=fBO_taV3uRw&feature=youtu.be


Join the Discord server for discounts, support, and discussion: https://discord.gg/CvV2MHk


Adventure Woman Alexis is a beautiful, PBR, female character model.Â She is fully rigged to the Epic skeleton, and has a fully rigged face. She comes with two full-body idle animations and thirteen different facial emote animations. The materials are all parameter driven to suppport infinite variation and I have included several example material instances for each part of the character. This pack includes an example Blueprint and Animation Blueprint as well. Character is composed of four meshes; Body, hair, eyes, and optional accessory pack.


Check out our seller page for other great products. https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/profile/Black%20Fang%20Technologies

Be sure to comment any suggestions, concerns, or praises down bellow. If you buy, be sure to leave a rating.

Reach out to us at xbl.black.fang@gmail.com for support.

Follow us on Twitter @BlackFangTech for updates and special offers.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  • One character, Alexis
  • Thirteen facial animations
  • Two idle body animations
  • Thigh-strapped accessory case
  • High customization materials
  • Two slight variations of hair style
  • Physically correct eye refraction shader

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes [Actually rigged to Epic skeleton, no retargetting shenanigans. Just consolidate skeleton assets.]

Animated: Yes

Number of characters: 1

Number of Meshes: 5

Vertex counts of meshes: 4680, 5418, 5709, 409, 706

Number of Textures: 27

Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096, 2048x2048, 1024x1024, 512x512

Number of Animations:15

Animation types: In-place

Animation list: Two idle poses, 13 facial animations

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows

Documentation: No
